name: HaPractitionerLM
title: HaPractitionerLM
purpose:
The Practitioner exposed by the HPI

Use cases:

* What is a person's CPN when I know the persons registration number i.e. Get using registration number
* What is a person's CPN when the person doesn’t have a registration i.e. search by name, gender
* What is a person's CPN when I don’t know the person’s registration number or CPN i.e. search by name, gender scope of practice
* What are a practitioner’s details (eg practicing certificate dates) when I have a CPN. ie. Get using CPN
description:
The Practitioner exposed by the HPI

Use cases:

* What is a person's CPN when I know the persons registration number i.e. Get using registration number
* What is a person's CPN when the person doesn’t have a registration i.e. search by name, gender
* What is a person's CPN when I don’t know the person’s registration number or CPN i.e. search by name, gender scope of practice
* What are a practitioner’s details (eg practicing certificate dates) when I have a CPN. ie. Get using CPN

element.definition: No description

element.label: HPI-CPN
element.definition: HPI Common Person Number is a unique 6 character identifier assigned by the HPI system to an individual person.
element.comment: This is the active CPN only. dormant CPN's are stored in an extension (see that element for the justification)

element.label: dormantCPN
element.definition: Other HPI-CPNs assigned to this person in the past
element.comment: dormantCPN is an HPI-CPN with use=old

element.label: otherIdentifier
element.definition: Identifiers supplied to the HPI from another source eg the medical council number, nursing council number. These are unique within their source system.

element.label: name
element.short: The name(s) associated with the person
element.definition: The name(s) associated with the person

element.label: gender
element.definition: A self-identified classification of the gender of the person.

element.label: birthDate
element.short: The date on which the person was born
element.definition: The date on which the person was born.

element.label: deathDate
element.definition: The date the person died.

element.label: communication
element.definition: Language(s) spoken by the person.

element.label: ethnicity
element.definition: Self-identified ethnicity of the person.

element.label: qualification
element.definition: Professional registrations for this individual
element.comment: Educational qualifications will not be included, just registrations and equivalent licence etc

element.label: status
element.definition: An indicator of the practicing status of the practitioner as supplied by their Responsible Authority or professional body.

element.label: identifier
element.short: An identifier for this registration for the practitioner
element.definition: A unique identifier assigned to the practitioner by the Responsible Authority or professional body.
element.comment:
the registration type would be the 'system' value of the identifier

duplicated in the otherIdentifier

element.label: code
element.definition: A code to identify the type of professional registration the person has been assigned
element.comment: the current codeset for registration type

element.label: period
element.short: The period the annual practicing certificate is effective
element.definition: The period the annual practicing certificate is effective

element.label: issuer
element.short: Organization that regulates and issues the registration
element.definition: Organization that regulates and issues the qualification. This is the Responsible Authority or the professional body eg medical council, midwifery council.
element.comment: First version is to use the reference.identifier with the system https://standards.digital.health.nz/id/hpi-organization

element.label: additionalAuthorization
element.definition: Additional authorizations that a practitioner is authorized to perform

element.label: code
element.definition: A code identifying the additional authorisations that a practitioner is authorised to perform

element.label: period
element.definition: The period the additional authorization is effective

element.label: scopeOfPractice
element.definition: The type or range of health services a practitioner is authorized to perform, as determined by the Responsible Authority or professional body.

element.label: code
element.definition: A code identifying the services that the practitioner is permitted to perform

element.label: description
element.definition: A full description of the health services that a health practitioner with this scope is permitted to perform

element.label: period
element.definition: The period the scope of practice is effective

element.label: conditionOnPractice
element.definition: A full description of the conditions the health practitioner is subject to in relation to their scope of practice.

element.label: description
element.definition: The condition on practice as text

element.label: period
element.definition: The period the conditions on practice are effective

element.label: initialDate
element.definition: The date the practitioner first became registered with the Responsible Authority or professional body
